list.name: Default
list.comment: Fixed a bug with Framebuffer attachment points

task.summary: Fixed a bug with Framebuffer attachment points
Fixed stencil component in Lighting Pass
Added check not to reboot PostMan if its already enabled
Don't know what i was thinking, ShaderToy shaders don't HAVE to be post-effects
Working on making some GL states stackable
Fixed bug where newly requested objects to be disposed where being ignored at shutdown
Removed LinearAttenuation from Point and Spot lights
